page.title: 06Meadowend Kennels, Guide.
page.content: Meadowend is a Boarding Kennels, Cattery and stray dogs' home. They care for all stray animals except birds which they take to Leighton Hall. There were about{1,100 stray dogs}in 1984,of which only 202 were reclaimed by their owners. Lots of dogs and cats get left when people go on holiday. A lot of people leave them because they dont like paying fees.{Every day in our country {over 2000 dogs and cats are killed. At Meadowend they have 1 donkey and 2 ponies but they have more which they have looked after elsewhere. They have 9 dogs themselves and they have adopted 3 others. Two people help when they can but they don't get paid. The dogs are fed according to their weight.
